items.title: Intern at CNPS Cameroon
items.description: Improved network monitoring administrator experience through artificial intelligence, involving the design of a WhatsApp chatbot to facilitate access to performance analyses from Zabbix. Tasks included server supervision, data analysis, multi-channel alerting, and machine learning integration.

items.title: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science – Systems & Networks
TrustAI Shield - AI Fraud & Deepfake Detection
items.description: An intelligent platform that analyzes social profiles, messages, and media to detect scams, deepfakes, and fake profiles with 98% accuracy.

items.title: AI-Powered Network Chatbot
items.description: Designed and implemented a conversational AI that integrates Zabbix with WhatsApp, enabling administrators to perform real-time network monitoring and receive instant incident alerts via chat.

items.title: Secure Network Access Control
items.description: Engineered a robust access control system using AAA (Freeradius) and 802.1X authentication. This solution provides granular control, strict user verification, and comprehensive access logging for corporate networks.

trust-ai.title: TrustAI Shield: AI Fraud & Deepfake Detection
trust-ai.subtitle: TrustAI Shield is your intelligent guardian against 21st-century cybercrime. In seconds, our AI analyzes any social profile, suspicious message, or media content to detect scams, deepfakes, and fake profiles with 98% accuracy.

about.title: About the Project: The Problem, A Silent Epidemic
about.description: Every day, millions of people worldwide are targeted by increasingly sophisticated cybercriminals. With 60% of cyberattacks starting with phishing and deepfakes enabling multi-million dollar heists, the threat is real and growing. Current detection technologies are often expensive, reserved for large corporations, and too slow to react. TrustAI Shield is an all-in-one intelligent platform that democratizes protection against cybercrime, making it accessible to everyone.

features.title: Key Features: 3 Complementary Modules
list: Profile Analysis: Comprehensive analysis of social profiles (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter). Calculates a TrustScore based on 15+ behavioral indicators to detect bots, fake accounts, and compromised profiles.
Scam Detection: Real-time analysis of suspicious texts and URLs. Identifies phishing, advance-fee scams, and crypto-scams using a database of fraud patterns that is updated daily.
Deepfake Detection: Verifies the authenticity of photos and videos. Detects manipulations by generative AI to protect against visual identity theft.

tech.title: Our Differentiator: Accessibility + Accuracy
tech.description: TrustAI Shield was built with an intuitive interface that requires no technical training, delivering results in under 10 seconds. Validated on over 10,000 real cases, it achieves 98% accuracy and is multilingual (FR, EN, ES, AR, PT). The platform is built with Next.js, ShadCN UI, and Tailwind CSS, providing a modern and responsive user experience.

activities.text: Participation in the SNK AI Challenge 2025 training seminar - Train 100 young people (20 per region)
